info.description: Nordea Card Information Services API v1
info.title: Cards API

parameters.name: Date
parameters.description: Standard http header element for date and time. HTTP headers are represented as RFC 7231 Full Dates. example date: Wed, 24 Apr 2019 14:00:37 EEST

parameters.name: Signature
parameters.description:
A signature of request by the TPP on application level. The process of signing a request is described in 'Signing HTTP Messages' RFC draft version 10 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-cavage-http-signatures-10). The request signature needs to be sent in the 'Signature' HTTP header as described in the RFC. Additional requirements from Nordea 
 - The only allowed algorithm is RSA-SHA256 
- The key size for the used RSA key pair has to be at least 2048 bit 
- The keyId is the clientId of your application originating from the Nordea Developer Portal 
- We require the following headers to be used in the signature 
* GET request: (request-target) host date 
* PUT and POST request: (request-target) host date content-type digest . 
* The request-target is a combination of the HTTP action verb and the request URI path.

parameters.name: X-IBM-Client-Id
parameters.description: Id of the Client

parameters.name: X-IBM-Client-Secret
parameters.description: Secret password generated for the Client

parameters.name: X-Nordea-Originating-User-Agent
parameters.description: End user (i.e. PSU) agent information, to be provided if TPP is in session with the PSU

parameters.name: X-Nordea-Originating-User-Ip
parameters.description: End user (i.e. PSU) IP address, to be provided if TPP is in session with the PSU

401.description:
Unauthorized with failure code:
* error.apikey.missing = Missing API key. This operation requires API key, but it was missing.
* error.token = Unspecified error with supplied token.
* error.token.invalid = Missing access token or token did not authorized requested operation. This operation requires valid access token, but it was missing.
* error.token.expired = Access token has expired.

parameters.name: continuation_key
parameters.description: Resource listing may return a continuationKey if there's more results available. Request may be retried with the continuationKey, but otherwise same parameters, in order to get more results.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Start date for transaction filtering

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End date for transaction filtering

DecoupledAuth.x-codeStatusDescription: Returns code when authorization second step is finished

CardTransactionListResponse.title: CardTransactionListResponse
CardTransactionListResponse.description: List of credit card transactions response

credit_available_balance.description: Available balance on the credit card

credit_booked_balance.description: Booked balance on the credit card

credit_limit.description: Credit limit of the credit card

parallel_cards.description: List of parallel cards belonging to this principal card

amount.description: Monetary amount of the credit card transaction in the cardÂ’s currency

beneficiary.description: Beneficiary of the credit card transaction

entry_date.description: Date when the transaction took place

failures.description: More details on the occurred error

path.description: JSON path of the failing element if applicable

type.description: Type of the validation error, e.g. NotNull

continuation_key.description: Resource listing may return a continuationKey if there's more results available. Request may be retried with the continuationKey, but otherwise same parameters, in order to get more results.

message_identification.description: Original request id for correlation purposes
